rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 3 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 11:37 AM, 13 July 2025(Sunday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Zambales, Bataan, Tarlac, Pampanga, Bulacan, Metro Manila, Rizal, Laguna, Quezon and Cavite within the next 3 hours.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
